summary: Adds a couple new spells and a sword.
descriptionHtml:
Adds new spells, a weapon, and makes fury not hostile. 

Spells: 
Blinding Fury - For when you just want some people to go on a rampage and probably die 
Dragon Launcher - When you kill a dragon and don\'t want to just leave the body laying there 
Slow Time - slows time to 64% speed for 10 seconds(the shout is at 35%) 
Stagger(WIP) - supposed to stagger you oppenents but doesn\'t want to work 
Push(WIP) - supposed to push enemies back like when using the full fus ro dah 

Weapon: 
Magic Sword - Drainheart Sword without enchantment because they are none without until now 

Location: 
Breezehome in Whiterun
author: MrZaneMan
